mapper.insert: insert into org_operation_user (oou_id, oou_carrier_id, oou_dept_id, oou_code, oou_name, oou_sex, oou_password, oou_superior, oou_identity_card, oou_birth, oou_phone, oou_mail, oou_education, oou_entry_date, oou_departure_date, oou_type, oou_status, oou_create_by, oou_create_time) values (#{oou_id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{oou_carrier_id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{oou_dept_id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{oou_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oou_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oou_sex,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{oou_password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oou_superior,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{oou_identity_card,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oou_birth,jdbcType=DATE}, #{oou_phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oou_mail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oou_education,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{oou_entry_date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{oou_departure_date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{oou_type,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{oou_status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{oou_create_by,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{oou_create_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update org_operation_user set oou_carrier_id = #{oou_carrier_id,jdbcType=CHAR}, oou_dept_id = #{oou_dept_id,jdbcType=CHAR}, oou_code = #{oou_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, oou_name = #{oou_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, oou_sex = #{oou_sex,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, oou_password = #{oou_password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, oou_superior = #{oou_superior,jdbcType=CHAR}, oou_identity_card = #{oou_identity_card,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, oou_birth = #{oou_birth,jdbcType=DATE}, oou_phone = #{oou_phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, oou_mail = #{oou_mail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, oou_education = #{oou_education,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, oou_entry_date = #{oou_entry_date,jdbcType=DATE}, oou_departure_date = #{oou_departure_date,jdbcType=DATE}, oou_type = #{oou_type,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, oou_status = #{oou_status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, oou_create_by = #{oou_create_by,jdbcType=CHAR}, oou_create_time = #{oou_create_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where oou_id = #{oou_id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select oou_id, oou_carrier_id, oou_dept_id, oou_code, oou_name, oou_sex, oou_password, oou_superior, oou_identity_card, oou_birth, oou_phone, oou_mail, oou_education, oou_entry_date, oou_departure_date, oou_type, oou_status, oou_create_by, oou_create_time from org_operation_user where oou_id = #{oou_id,jdbcType=CHAR}

select oou_id, oou_carrier_id, oou_dept_id, oou_code, oou_name, oou_sex, oou_password, oou_superior, oou_identity_card, oou_birth, oou_phone, oou_mail, oou_education, oou_entry_date, oou_departure_date, oou_type, oou_status, oou_create_by, oou_create_time from org_operation_user where oou_name = #{oou_name}
select a.or_name from org_role a inner join org_user_role b on b.our_role_id = a.or_id where b.our_user_id = #{userId}
